replies.bodyText: There are still too many if statement in this function. At least 4 of them just result in a BAD_REQUEST being returned. Why don't you move all of those out into a function called "verifyUserRegistrationRequest" that returns a boolean. Then you only need to return a BAD_REQUEST from one place in this method.
